divs: Sighting Details1. I couldn't go to sleep, so I stepped outside the side porch for some air. 2. I was just gazing at the stars when I noticed the lit object. 3. When I first noticed it I thought it was a plane in the distant, but when my eyes adjusted to it, I noticed it was huge with multiple lights. 4. It was a V-Shaped UFO with multiple lights under it. It was traveling pretty quickly from a South to North Direction. I was getting excited because it was going to pass pretty close to the moon and I was going to get a better view of its outline. As it got closer the lights quickly dimmed and it vanished. 5. At first I was startled to see something so close, then I got excited about it. 6. It seemed to vanish and there was no more sign of it.
trends: There have been 106 other sightings in Colorado Springs
There were no other sightings in Colorado Springs on or around April 2nd 2012
